parameters.name: Cpu
parameters.description: The number of vCPUs. For information about the vCPU and memory specifications that are supported by Elastic Container Instance, see [vCPU and memory specifications](~~114662~~).

parameters.name: EphemeralStorage
parameters.description: The storage size of the temporary storage space. Unit: GiB.

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description:
The instance type of the Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance that is used to create the elastic container instance. For information about the ECS instance types that are supported by Elastic Container Instance, see [ECS instance types that are supported by Elastic Container Instance](~~114664~~).

> If you specify this parameter, the specified specifications of vCPUs and memory are ignored. Only the price of the ECS instance type is returned.

parameters.name: Memory
parameters.description: The size of the memory. Unit: GiB. For information about the vCPU and memory specifications that are supported by Elastic Container Instance, see [vCPU and memory specifications](~~114662~~).

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~146965~~) operation to query the most recent region and zone list.

parameters.name: SpotDuration
parameters.description: The protection period of the preemptible instance. Unit: hours. Default value: 1. The value of 0 indicates no protection period.

parameters.name: SpotPriceLimit
parameters.description: The maximum hourly price of the preemptible elastic container instance. The value can contain up to three decimal places. If you set SpotStrategy to SpotWithPriceLimit, you must specify SpotPriceLimit.

parameters.name: SpotStrategy
parameters.description:
The bidding policy for the elastic container instance. Valid values:

*   NoSpot: The instance is a regular pay-as-you-go instance.
*   SpotWithPriceLimit: The instance is a preemptible instance with a user-defined maximum hourly price.
*   SpotAsPriceGo: The instance is a preemptible instance for which the market price at the time of purchase is automatically used as the bid price.

Default value: NoSpot.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The zone ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~146965~~) operation to query the most recent region and zone list.
